channel.title: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]
channel.description:
# The Something **Life's Curse(Passive)** - Night Immune **Your fault!(Passive)** - Your killer will be unable to kill during the next night or something like that **Weakness Potion(Day)** - You are not Night Immune tonight - 1 Use **Seek Death(Night)** - Make a player target you, if they are a killer their kill pierces Night Immunity tonight(and therefore will kill you because that's how it would work) - 1-Night Cooldown **Don't look at me!(Night)** - All investigations on you tonight will be redirected to a random player - 2 Uses *Objective: Be Killed at Night*
Ways to die: Night Immunity Piercing Attack(e.g. Prince) Bleed Poison Visit a Killer with **Seek Death** Hunter's **Retribution**

Read full topic

item.source: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]

item.title: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
The chances of you finding a killer increases the long the game goes on. The chances of you luring a night kill somewhat decreases as classes become confirmed. I feel weakness potion needs more skill to win with than seek death

Read full topic
item.source: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]

item.title: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
you can’t spam it, you’ve got a cooldown, you need to think tactically about shit

Read full topic
item.source: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]

item.title: The Unfool (Better Name at some point) [Neutral Social maybe]
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Not necessarily, you have to lure in an attack from someone affected by killing you. Seek death is a paint by numbers kill. Just spam the ability, and you’ll eventually hit reaper or something

Read full topic
